reviewText: Excellent
Loved Season 1 & 2 and certainly hope there will be a Season 3.  All the main characters are realistically portrayed.  Didn't like the surprise ending and hoping Season 3 will clear it up.
Loved this show, happy that Canadian TV continued with it and released the second series. Quick delivery
The second season is fantastic.  It is really a shame that the brainless dweebs on American networks could not see the value of this show.  Looking forward to season 3.
Powerful engaging series. I wish we could get it in the US.
Great series!  I wish this hadn't been taken of US television but I was very glad to be able to get this DVD.

Saving Hope is a really good television show. Unfortunately the only way to see Saving Hope in the United States is to buy the DVDs (if they are made available). I wish the producers of the show would allow all seasons of Saving Hope to be streamed on Amazon.com (Amazon Instant Video). This would allow the show to be viewed by people in the United States as well as Canada.

My wife loved season one , but then it was taken off and only shown in Canada.  This was a chance for my wife to see the second season without buying it an episode at a time.  Season 3 has started in Canada and I'll buy it for her when it's available.  It's a nice show.
Absolutely love this show and wish it played in the USA. I ordered this season 2 dvd set and watched the whole season in a few days!
Loved season 1 and was delighted this was available from Canada.  Liked the 2nd season even better.  Can't wait for season 3 to become available.
Great transaction snd dvd
My Favorite show love it
Loved it
Great series!
Loved how it ended waiting for season 3
Great Show
You can never go wrong with Saving Hope! My favorite show.

Love this show. Thought the lead looked familiar and then finally realized it is Daniel from Stargate SG-1. Wow. But if you have cable in the USA and get Ion syndicated channel, it is on  Tuesdays and Saturdays at the ridiculous time of 11:00PM and a second episode at midnight. Have never seen a whole episode so I have ordered the whole series, 1-4 and season 5 starts this Tuesday at midnight. Oh yes BTW I have all 11 seasons of SG-1, the 2 movies after and Atlantis. I guess I really like Michael Shanks.
great show
Best show ever!! Never a dull moment!! Amazing!!
Saving Hope season 2 arrives on time and in new condition. Having watched some of the episodes on TV, Michael Weatherby is one of my favorite actors, so I look forward to seeing this season soon.
I enjoy this show very much.
Great show!
Love the series. Looking forward to gettingSeason 3. Great characters, lots of action and a plot with twist after twist.
Love this show
Love the show
I don't think they can make enough of this series!
One of my favorite shows

This is my favorite series.  Have seen season 2 and it was interesting and the characters are very good actors.

Love this show
I loved this show. I have ordered season 4 and have been waiting for months to get it. It is still out of stock. I do have season 1 2 and 3 now.

my sister loved it - it was a bday gift
Keep up good work. Thanks. David
Love the series can't wait for season 5

I love this series and am so glad season 2 is finally available.  This isn't your typical medical show.  Great characters with definite quirks. Just my cup of tea. Great for a weekend of binge watching.

I really loved the first season. And purchased the second season. But. When I received the season I could not watch it.  It had an error saying wrong region. Now I own something I could not watch from amazon.
Delivered early and as described.
It arrived before I even said
nice to be able to sit and watch the entire season
Love this series!!!!!
The DVDs will not play in my DVD player. They are on another country's format.
LOVE SAVING HOPE
Can't play it . For wrong zone.

I have the four seasons, had to reorder season 2 because the one I had ordered before, does
 not play on my dvd player but does on my portable lap top. Want it back?
no comment
Great!!

I absolutely love the show even though I can only watch it on Tuesday's on ion t.v. I came on here to order them and can only get the first and third and apparently it has been that way for over 6 months. Hope the second season comes soon.

Love this series, but like many who are interested in it I can't stay up to watch it.  Glad to find it and have bought 2 copies of seasons 1 and 3.  One for me and one for  relative who lives in another state.  I hope season two becomes available soon as I want to buy two copies of it as well.  It's a great series, great acting and great story lines.  I like the shows that have "spirit" interaction.  It puts me in mind of Dead Zone with Anthony Michael Hall.  That was a favorite of mine too. Please get more soon.
Loved season 1 and really want to buy season 2 if it's ever made available

It is one of my favorite shows Here in St. Louis it is on the IONS channel which is 46.1. They show two new segments back to back on Tuesday nights and then they are repeated on Friday nights.

I have been trying to find out if there is a Season 3. I sure hope so. I have Season 1 on DVD and Season 2 on DVD is coming out later this year.

Absolutely wonderful show, so glad it's on DVD to watch.  Missed it when it left the USA, glad it's back but on too late in my time zone.  Great cliff hanger at end.  Even my husband loved watching it.  Great humor, good storyline and acting.  Fun show.  Can't wait to get Season 3 on DVD.

I found Season 1 is being broadcast on ION tv ! I think it's a cross between early  Grey's anatomy and Just like heaven the movie Reese Witherspoon did awhile back. Love it looks like a lot of twists and turns
Season 2 is GREAT also. Can't wait until I can buy season 3!!! Love this show.
Love this show. Wish it was still on in U.S.
This show has solid actors although some of the plot is disjointed.  A woman sticks by her man through the worst then suddenly she becomes loose.  Could have a better idea about the ending.
I love this show and was so excited to find out it was available thru Amazon since it is not shown in the US.
Great show, wish you had the third season available.
Love this show.  Now I can catch up on all the episodes while exercising on my walker.
Love prices but some of the brand new dvds skip.
